summary: OpenLeverage Launches Mainnet on Ethereum - OpenLeverage has launched its mainnet on the Ethereum blockchain, enabling permissionless lending, borrowing, and margin trading on decentralized exchanges. Users can create lending and trading pools for any trading pair available on a DEX, with default interest rates and risk parameters. The platform supports margin trading of thousands of tokens with reduced borrowing rates compared to other platforms. Users can also pledge any token as collateral and borrow another token in a token pair as long as sufficient liquidity is provided. OpenLeverage is deployed on multiple chains, including Ethereum, BNB Chain, Arbitrum, and Kucoin Community Chain.
